1504680.name: My Neighborhood Arcade: Collector's Pass 2020 & 2021 Winter/Spring
1504680.description:
Grab the My Neighborhood Arcade: Collector's Pass 2020 & 2021 Winter/Spring and get the 18 units to be released in the first 6 months of 2021 permanently added to your collection - new units are revealed every month. (Units will include 6 each Super Dime and Quarter Play games, 3 each Double Sweet and Dollar Drop games). In addition to the 2021 Winter/Spring games, you'll also get the 11 games from 2020 added to your collection immediately for a total of 29 games.

2020
Super Dime
Bit Converger
Infinimath
Tower Stacker
Speed Box

Quarter Play
Block Puzzle
Hot Market
Rolling Ball 3D
Picture Puzzle

Double Sweet
RC Targets: Dronez

Dollar Drops
Wheels Of Fortunes
Claw Machine Pro

Currently Released 2021 Games
Quarter Play
Pathfinder
Number Crunchers

Dollar Drops
Hoop Swish
